reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the reform and development of China’s pension sector

description.narrative: This project is designed to draw on UK expertise, and the UK model, to support China's pension reform. With an ageing population in China, there is a pressing need to develop a stronger pension framework. The project will build foundations for the Financial Services pillar of a China prosperity programme. The programme will work to promote financial sector reform though sharing policy and private sector expertise, and capacity building in the Chinese regulatory sector. It will look to generate opportunities for international business, including UK companies.
